message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  While I can't disclose specifics right now, I can assure you it's worth no less than $10000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.  This is a price I'm comfortable with, knowing its potential value to the right person. Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss further details.
